requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
